snippet: Second-seeded Ekaterina Makarova withdrew from the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C., with a stomach illness.
abstract: Ekaterina Makarova withdraws from Family Circle Cup tennis tournament because of stomach illness.
lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Ekaterina Makarova withdrew from the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C., with a stomach illness.

headline.main: Ekaterina Makarova Withdraws With Illness in Charleston
